value: Merry Christmas everybody I wanted to do
a quick video just to say thank you to
everybody for being here this year over
the last six months all the new
subscribers all the people who've shared
my videos and left amazing wonderful
comments I have learned so much from you
and I'm just thrilled to be able to
participate in this Great Awakening that
I see happening at the start of 2018 the
world felt very different to me than it
feels now I believe there was a
combination of factors over the last 12
months which have shifted the spirit of
most of the world to be honest with you
I mean some things beyond anybody's
imagining like North and South Korea
tentatively having peace between them I
mean I'm sure it's fragile
I'm sure there's details to be worked
out but that that's amazing and the
Great Awakening the q1 on thing love it
or hate it it has brought together a lot
of people it has opened a lot of eyes it
is made a lot of connections and this is
worldwide it really is you know in
France they call demonstrations and
protests they call them manifestation
manifestations and it's such a perfect
word word for what is happening if you
think about how how ideas become reality
it's out there it's almost a feeling
it's an intuition and then it's picked
up by the antennas within each of us and
it just sort of sits there until it can
be put into words then once those words
form around that original intuition the
words can be shared then so that we can
pass that meaning and inspiration on to
the next person and it's like a snowball
and it's happening
it's really happening I don't think this
current state that we are in where we
are actually recognizing maybe for the
first time in history on it at least for
the first time ever on a global scale or
an international scale we're recognizing
that the people we should be fighting
are not there they're not even
ideological enemies so much not in the
way we've come to know it
they are elites versus the rest of us
the people who have controlled all of
the things that we rely on to live money
food health education and defense the
law they're moving now into information
itself and these maniacs these
power-hungry control freak elite
lunatics are actually coming for the
very air we breathe now the sunlight the
wind in this form of this taxation of
for climate change prevention how much
farther that can they go well we know we
can already see the next steps they want
to take and that's right up in here they
will not be satisfied until they can
sell our consciousness back to us I
don't know if it's Q I don't know if it
was taxes I'm sure it's a combination of
a million factors but here we are here
we are at the end of one of the most
revolutionary years there might have
ever been in terms of a global
consciousness shift it's remarkable so
I'm really hopeful for 2019
I mean I'm prepared for many hard hits
for many disappointments I'm prepared
for all that I'm prepared for them to
clamp
down harder on the flow of information
I'm prepared for them to keep making
examples of dissidents that they don't
so to scare other people off I'm
prepared for all of that but one thing I
know is when a person's spirit is
ignited and when the crack of light that
is the truth breaks through to them
there is no turning back
that spirit ignited spirit can't be
extinguished that spark of truth can't
be unlearned it can't be unseen
this can't be undone so it's going to
grow and the opposition to it is going
to grow and I think we have to fight it
I think there is a short time left and I
think it's possible for us to lose this
battle but now is the time now is the
time and I see I see the signs can't you
can't you see the signs why is the elite
fighting so hard it's certainly because
they feel they're they're threatened and
we are the ones threatening them I hope
in 2019 to bring some ideas and to
connect with other people who have ideas
about how we can go forward and how to
envision the place that we are going to
because that's so important like I said
earlier it starts with that idea that
inspiration and then it transforms into
words and from the words we can share
and from the sharing we create the
reality so that's that's my aim in 2019
let's start sharing and creating the new
reality
I just thank you to everybody for your
donations your subscriptions your
comments and sharing it has meant the
world to me and what I want to leave you
with is something maybe you could watch
and enjoy over this Christmas Eve
and I think it goes to so much of what
we are trying to conceptualize here and
and it's soothing it's inspirational
and has clues as to what we need to do
to take back control of our lives our
countries our towns our cities our kids
our education system our health care
system and everything I'm gonna leave a
link in the description box to a
documentary called Pope John Paul the
second liberation of a continent or
liberating a continent it's wonderful
and I hope you'll enjoy it and I think
you'll see that at least in my opinion
what we really you can disagree with me
if you want but I believe that
Christianity the inspiration of Christ
is important if we can find our way back
to that if we can go forward meeting
under that sort of a banner planning
under that sort of an inspiration then I
think we have a great fighting chance to
win this thing okay I'm gonna stop
talking now until next time have a Merry
Merry Christmas everybody I'll see you
soon
